description.text:
...any $(b;spring)information$()?
I haven't been successful either... - The pixie starts digging through a pile of books -
 'Antique Atlas...I'd rather have an updated version...'How to tame your dragon'....that's a fast way to meet an early demise!
 'Creatures...and....Beasts'...isn't that the same? -the pixie sighs-
So...pretty self explanatory....find crystals...open end portal...So much effort! Maybe we should go back to your comfortable grave?
